headline: Stronger Q4 Revenue And Big Buybacks Might Change The Case For Investing In Airbnb (ABNB)
summary: Airbnb reported its fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results on 12 February 2026, with Q4 revenue rising to US$2.78 billion from US$2.48 billion a year earlier, while quarterly net income eased to US$341 million and full-year net income edged down to US$2.51 billion. Alongside the earnings, Airbnb completed roughly US$6.47 billion of share repurchases across two buyback programs and filed a US$2.32 billion shelf registration for ESOP-related Class A shares, underscoring management’s focus...

Alongside the earnings, Airbnb completed roughly US$6.47 billion of share repurchases across two buyback programs and filed a US$2.32 billion shelf registration for ESOP-related Class A shares, underscoring management’s focus...
